The Sabbath <S%H7676><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> shall be for food <S%H402><s%> for you; <S%H5650><s%> for yourself, for your servant, for your maid, <S%H519><s%> for your hired servant, <S%H5650><s%> and for your stranger, <S%H8453><s%> who lives as a foreigner with you. <S%H8453><s%>
For your livestock <S%H929><s%> also, <S%H2416><s%> and for the animals that are in your land, <S%H776><s%> shall all its increase <S%H8393><s%> be for food. <S%H398><s%>

<S%H5608><s%>"'You shall count off seven <S%H7651><s%> Sabbaths <S%H7676><s%> of years, <S%H8141><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> times <S%H6471><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> years; <S%H8141><s%> and there shall be to you the days <S%H3117><s%> of seven <S%H7651><s%> Sabbaths <S%H7676><s%> of years, <S%H8141><s%> even forty <S%H8141><s%> - nine years.

You shall make the fiftieth <S%H2572><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> holy, <S%H6942><s%> and proclaim <S%H7121><s%> liberty <S%H1865><s%> throughout the land <S%H776><s%> to all its inhabitants. <S%H3427><s%> It shall be a jubilee <S%H3104><s%> to you; <S%H376><s%> and each of you shall return <S%H7725><s%> to his own property, <S%H272><s%> and each <S%H376><s%> of you shall return <S%H7725><s%> to his family. <S%H4940><s%>

<S%H8141><s%>"'In this Year of Jubilee <S%H3104><s%> each <S%H376><s%> of you shall return <S%H7725><s%> to his property. <S%H272><s%>

<S%H4376><s%>"'If you sell anything <S%H4465><s%> to your neighbor, <S%H5997><s%> or buy <S%H7069><s%> from your <S%H3027><s%> neighbor, <S%H5997><s%> you shall not wrong <S%H3238><s%> one <S%H376><s%> another. <S%H251><s%>

According <S%H6310><s%> to the length <S%H7230><s%> of the years <S%H8141><s%> you shall increase <S%H7235><s%> its price, <S%H4736><s%> and according <S%H6310><s%> to the shortness <S%H4591><s%> of the years <S%H8141><s%> you shall diminish <S%H4591><s%> its price; <S%H4736><s%> for he is selling <S%H4376><s%> the number <S%H4557><s%> of the crops to you. <S%H8393><s%>

<S%H6213><s%>"'Therefore you shall do my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> and keep <S%H8104><s%> my ordinances <S%H4941><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> them; <S%H3427><s%> and you shall dwell in the land <S%H776><s%> in safety. <S%H983><s%>

then I will command <S%H6680><s%> my blessing <S%H1293><s%> on you in the sixth <S%H8345><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> and it shall bring forth <S%H6213><s%> fruit <S%H8393><s%> for the three <S%H7969><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>

<S%H776><s%>"'The land shall not be sold <S%H4376><s%> in perpetuity, <S%H6783><s%> for the land <S%H776><s%> is mine; <S%H1616><s%> for you are strangers and live as foreigners with me. <S%H8453><s%>

<S%H251><s%>"'If your brother becomes poor, <S%H4134><s%> and sells <S%H4376><s%> some of his possessions, <S%H272><s%> then his kinsman <S%H7138><s%> who is next to him shall come, <S%H935><s%> and redeem <S%H1350><s%> that which his brother <S%H251><s%> has sold. <S%H4465><s%>

<S%H376><s%>"'If a man sells <S%H4376><s%> a dwelling <S%H4186><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> in a walled <S%H2346><s%> city, <S%H5892><s%> then he may redeem <S%H1353><s%> it within a whole <S%H8552><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> after it has been sold. <S%H4465><s%> For a full year <S%H3117><s%> he shall have the right of redemption. <S%H1353><s%>

<S%H5892><s%>"'Nevertheless the cities of the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> the houses <S%H1004><s%> in the cities <S%H5892><s%> of their possession, <S%H272><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> may redeem <S%H1353><s%> at any time. <S%H5769><s%>

<S%H251><s%>"'If your brother has become poor, <S%H4134><s%> and his hand can't <S%H4131><s%> support him among you; <S%H3027><s%> then you shall uphold <S%H2388><s%> him. <S%H2416><s%> He shall live with you like an alien <S%H1616><s%> and a temporary resident. <S%H8453><s%>

You shall not lend <S%H5414><s%> him your money <S%H3701><s%> at interest, <S%H5392><s%> nor give <S%H5414><s%> him your food <S%H400><s%> for profit. <S%H4768><s%>

I am Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> who brought you forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> you the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> and to be your God. <S%H430><s%>
<S%H251><s%>"'If your brother has grown poor <S%H4134><s%> among you, <S%H4376><s%> and sells himself to you; <S%H5647><s%> you shall not make him to serve <S%H5656><s%> as a slave. <S%H5650><s%>
As a hired servant, <S%H7916><s%> and as a temporary resident, <S%H8453><s%> he shall be with you; <S%H5647><s%> he shall serve with you until the Year <S%H8141><s%> of Jubilee: <S%H3104><s%>

<S%H5650><s%>"'As for your male and your female <S%H519><s%> slaves, <S%H1471><s%> whom you may have; of the nations that are around <S%H5439><s%> you, <S%H7069><s%> from them you may buy male <S%H5650><s%> and female slaves. <S%H519><s%>

<S%H8453><s%>"'If an alien or temporary resident <S%H1616><s%> with you <S%H3027><s%> becomes rich, <S%H5381><s%> and your brother <S%H251><s%> beside him has grown poor, <S%H4134><s%> and sells <S%H4376><s%> himself to the stranger <S%H1616><s%> or foreigner <S%H1616><s%> living among you, <S%H6133><s%> or to a member of the stranger <S%H1616><s%>'s family; <S%H4940><s%>

For to me the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> are servants; <S%H5650><s%> they are my servants <S%H5650><s%> whom I brought out <S%H3318><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%> I am Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>
